bioconda.name: bioconductor-shinymethyl
bioconda.summary: Interactive visualization for Illumina methylation arrays

biotools.summary: Interactive tool for visualizing Illumina methylation array data. Both the 450k and EPIC array are supported.

bioschemas.name: shinyMethyl
bioschemas.summary: Interactive tool for visualizing Illumina methylation array data. Both the 450k and EPIC array are supported.
